summary: Email correspondence between prosecutors and defense attorneys regarding proposed jury questionnaires for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The email discusses disagreements over wording, formatting issues, and concerns about including victim names and argumentative questions.

events.title: Deadline for letter submission
events.description: Mention of a letter due on Tuesday, October 12, 2021, related to the trial proceedings.

keyFacts: Prosecutors and defense attorneys are negotiating language for jury questionnaires in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
Disagreements exist over specific wording, with prosecutors marking defense language in red and their rejected proposals in blue.
Concerns are raised about including victim names in the questionnaire and questions being framed in an argumentative manner.
A deadline for submitting a letter is set for Tuesday, October 12, 2021, prompting urgency in finalizing the documents.
